heroSubtitle: Expert tutoring for A2, AS, and OL/IGCSE Chemistry and Biology with personalized attention and proven results.
aboutContent: With years of experience in teaching Chemistry and Biology, Dr. Noor provides comprehensive tutoring for students preparing for A2, AS, and OL/IGCSE examinations. Our academy focuses on building strong fundamentals and developing problem-solving skills.

features.title: Expert Teaching
features.description: Experienced instructor with proven track record in Chemistry and Biology education

features.title: Flexible Learning
features.description: Both online and in-person classes available to suit your schedule and preferences

features.title: Personalized Attention
features.description: Small class sizes ensure individual attention and customized learning approaches

features.title: Proven Results
features.description: Consistent track record of student success in A2, AS, and OL/IGCSE examinations
